lead_paragraph: An independent panel found that Tokyo's $2 million payment to a Singaporean consulting firm in connection with its bid to host the Tokyo 2020 Games was legitimate, its head said on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Investigators Clear Bribery Allegations in Japan's 2020 Bid
headline.main: Investigators Clear Bribery Allegations in Japan's 2020 Bid

snippet: An independent panel found that Tokyo's $2 million payment to a Singaporean consulting firm in connection with its bid to host the Tokyo 2020 Games was legitimate, its head said on Thursday....
